name: Virtual Workshop
description:
Virtual Workshop is a 3D simulator of power tools available in mechanical workshops. 

This simulator has playable tools like

  • Vertical milling machine
  • Horizontal milling machine
  • Lathe machine

And more machines will be added, and many game-play enhancements will be done in further updates.

CONTROLLS:

W,A,S,D to move around, hold left/right mouse buttons to operate machines, H to enable/disable hints and description, P to return to Menu.

DOWNLOAD: Vmm Tutorial 1_Compressed -1.mp4 for video tutorial
